E-commerce website

I created an e-commerce website using Laravel Rest API and Reactjs that includes a special management interface, which is the Dashboard. It also contains special permissions for every person active on the site. It also includes both Adding to the cart and modifying the cart by the user. Favorite addition With the ability to filter data and find the amount of sales according to the day, month and year The possibility of modifying the products by the manager.
